other_tests.procedure_name: Real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR)
other_tests.findings: Transiently positive for vesicular stomatitis virus nucleoprotein gene and Ebola virus glycoprotein gene, but consistently negative for Ebola virus nucleoprotein gene.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Results remained positive on days 3 and 4, but with threshold cycle values increasing from 37 to 40, indicating less viremia.

other_tests.findings: Demonstrated sinus bradycardia (56 beats/min) and incomplete right bundle-branch block.
Induced self-limited febrile syndrome with an increase in body temperature, malaise, and moderate to severe symptoms.
